A high-level delegation from Sudurpaschim Province, Nepal, led by their Chief Minister, visited NHPC Corporate Office in Faridabad.

Three units (200 MW each) of NHPC's 800 MW Parbati-II Hydroelectric Project were commissioned on April 1st, 2025, with power generation from all four units beginning on April 17th, 2025.

Shri Suprakash Adhikari took over as the Director (Technical) of NHPC on April 16th, 2025.

NHPC observed the 134th birth anniversary of Babasaheb Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar on April 15th, 2025.

NHPC was conferred with the CII HR Excellence Award for 2024-25 on March 28th, 2025.

NHPC plans to have an installed capacity of more than 23 GW by 2032 and over 50 GW by 2047. The 2000 MW Subansiri Lower Hydroelectric Project (Assam/Arunachal Pradesh) and 800 MW Parbati-II Hydroelectric Project (Himachal Pradesh) were among the key projects mentioned by the CMD for the successful commissioning in 2025.
